scripts.start: concurrently -n "SHARED,REMOTE,HOST" -c "green,cyan,magenta" "npm run start --workspace=shared" "npm run start --workspace=apps/remote" "npm run start --workspace=apps/host"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build --workspaces --if-present
scripts.build:shared: npm run build --workspace=shared && npm run build:webpack --workspace=shared
scripts.serve: concurrently -n "SHARED,REMOTE,HOST" -c "green,cyan,magenta" "npm run serve --workspace=shared" "npm run serve --workspace=apps/remote" "npm run serve --workspace=apps/host"
